Welcome! This page organizes my **coursework by university**.

**How it works**  
Keep one folder per university (`sapienza/`, `federico-ii/`, `deusto/`, `nautico/`) with an `index.qmd` inside.  
Add one `.qmd` per course in that folder—everything will list here automatically.
:::
